title: The No.1 Host In Kabukicho Vs The No.1 Demon King Of The Underworld: The Most Beautiful  Battle In History Is Born!!!
alternative_title: The host and the demon king ; ホストと魔王 ; 歌舞伎町No.1ホスト VS 魔界No.1魔王 ; 史上最強に美しいバトル（？）コメディ爆誕！！！！！
status: The host and the demon king ; ホストと魔王 ; 歌舞伎町No.1ホスト VS 魔界No.1魔王 ; 史上最強に美しいバトル（？）コメディ爆誕！！！！！
description:
Description :
        Suddenly, a demon king arrived at Kabukicho from the demon world. At the host club I entered by chance, I met Yusha, the No. 1 host of Kabukicho, and challenged her to fight...!? The strongest and most beautiful battle in history (?) The comedy has begun...!!
